@pixi/loaders > PIXI > Signal

PIXI.Signal 

class Signal

Constructor

new PIXI.Signal() → {}

MiniSignal constructor.


 let mySignal = new Signal();
 let binding = mySignal.add(onSignal);
 mySignal.dispatch('foo', 'bar');
 mySignal.detach(binding);
